DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness new laser removal unsightly spider vein legs . The device use study Cutera Excel V laser , dual wavelength 532 nm potassium titanyl phosphate ( KTP ) 1064 nm neodymium-doped yttrium aluminum garnet ( Nd : YAG ) laser . The Excel V laser receive 510 ( k ) clearance FDA , mean FDA approve laser dermatological vascular condition , like spider vein .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Lower Extremity Spider Veins With Excel V
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject receive 532 nm KTP laser treatment low extremity spider vein least 2 , 4 , separate area . Subjects receive 2 laser treatment space 12 week apart . Subjects follow 24 week ( 12 week final laser treatment ) . Efficacy evaluate blinded independent physician assessment improvement treat spider vein use digital photograph take baseline final follow-up visit third-party medical photography service . In addition , efficacy evaluate Investigator 's mean global assessment improvement subject 's mean assessment improvement . Safety evaluate continuous monitoring adverse event ( AEs ) measure pain associate laser treatment .
